select * from eb_order where uid = #{userId}
and `status` in (1,2) and group_buy_record_status in (99,10)
and `status` = 3 and group_buy_record_status in (99,10)
and `status` = #{status}
and refund_status < 3
and is_user_del = 0 and is_merchant_del = 0 and second_type <> 4 and is_del = 0
